question: Supersonic cruise missile BrahMos was test fired in Chandipur Integrated Test Range which is located in which state?
explanation: The supersonic cruise missile BrahMos was recently test fired from Odishaâ€™s Chandipur Integrated Test Range. The land based version of the missile was launched from mobile autonomous launcher at Complex- III of the facility. The launch facility is located on the Abdul Kalam Island.
